subject: Cycling, Road
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez won the Giro di Lombardia in Italy with a late solo breakaway in the rain to end the season at the top of the cycling union’s rankings.
snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez won the Giro di Lombardia in Italy with a late solo breakaway in the rain to end the season at the top of the cycling union’s rankings.
